about_the_game:
Type King is a typing and jumping game. With three different game modes all of which have three difficulty levels there is plenty to play here! The land is split into fifteen states all of which are led by corrupt governors from their high towers. It is up to you to rid the land of corruption by overruling the leaders of those states. Only then can you be crowned the Type King!

Jumping
This might look easy but I assure you it is not. A vital skill for every Type King which makes this game mode a good place to start your journey.


Typing
Hone your typing skills with this game mode where both speed and accuracy are needed. With the different difficulty levels there is challenge for everyone!


Type King
Typing and jumping combined makes Type King! There are three varieties of this game mode: Multiplayer co-op where one player is typing and the other is jumping as well as singleplayer variants where you type with one hand and jump with the other.


Save progress by unlocking codes
In Easy and Normal difficulty the checkpoints between floors include codes which can be used in the menu to continue where you left off. These aren't there to help in Hard difficulty so just keep practising!

Accessibility
Type King is family-friendly and can be enjoyed by people of any age! It also has option for easy to read font.

Keyboard layouts
Supports QWERTY, AZERTY, QWERTZ and DVORAK keyboard layouts

Comments
This is absolutely horrible. This is the hardest game I've ever played!
-Developer's eight years old cousin who can't get enough of Type King

After hours of trying I finally saw the top of the tower in Jumping on Hard difficulty and then I fell and now I'm losing my mind
-Developer's friend (could be former friend now)

name: Type King

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.33 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 6200 LE or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Highly recommend a screen with 16:9 aspect ratio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Type King has three different game modes: Typing, Jumping and those combined makes Type King! With some variety and different difficulties there is a total of fifteen levels to beat before you can be crowned the Type King!
supported_languages: English, Finnish, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
